name: Clemorot and the haunted shop
description:
"Clemorot and the haunted shop" is an small survival fangame made for the blinky adventure fanjam 2022, in this fangame you play as clemorot who just opened his brand new hat living hat shop, the only problem is, its infested by the spirits of dead gingus enemies, so armed with his guitar gun thing, he tries his best to not go bankrupt while dealing with the pesky ghosts, how far will he get?

This game basically just plays on the loop of bringing hats to your clients, recharge some stuff and killing enemies that get more tougher every round
